Qualification.

Our philosophy.

The life values ​​of the founders are at the heart of the company's rules. The most important things are honesty and responsibility to our clients. Initiative while ordering! As a rule, our clients become our long-term partners.

Technologies

Technologies we are usually working with
BackEnd FrontEnd Design

BackEnd

We implement the internal part of the project in Python. Frameworks: Django (DRF), Flask, FastAPI, AWS Chalice. We work with AWS through Cloud Formations.

FrontEnd

We are implementing part of the project on React
or AngularJS. Layout on Gulp.

Design

We use a lot of programs for design. Figma, Photoshop, Illustrator and others.

Why do customers choose us?

Our team is Front-end / Back-end developers, designers and project managers with experience more than 4-5 years. We solve almost every web tasks. From a simple chat-bot development to a website for startup.

Partnership with a client is at the heart of our work. You get not only a company that realizes a project in time but a partner who’ll focus attention on gaps in a technical task at the right time and be always in touch in messengers. Although with such an easy-to-read code you won’t even think of calling tech support. We consider this way to be the most right. It is easy and pleasant for clients to work with us.
The first order was completed in 2018
Our last work: “Web development for an investment project”

FAQ:

Will I be satisfied with the results?

Read the answer
Definitely yes. At the first stage we offer you design ideas. Right after your feedback and edits we make a prototype that will resonate with you, for sure.

How could I maintain a website in future?

Read the answer
We create an admin dashboard that you could use for maintaining a website even with no knowledge in programming. It’s easy and convenient. And we are always here in case you need some radical changes.

What should I do?

Read the answer
At first, during the conference calls we make up a technical task. It usually takes 1-3 an hour calls. Then we request your content on the website. It also usually needs some time to reach agreements on drafts and make changes. We’re always ready to adapt to your schedule and provide you with copywriting or editing service, if necessary.

Signing of the agreement.

Read the answer
For each project we draw up a contract to which we attach the technical task, deadlines, payment stages and other legal aspects. We’re ready to adapt a contract to you, add some new items if needed. We can assure you there will be no problems or delays on that stage.

Do you still have any questions?

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us.
